events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit well. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The issue has been classified as a refund request related to an unsuitable product size.
The case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Lisa for further assistance.
Hello! I’m Lisa from Customer Support. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I’m here to help you.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is in its original condition with tags attached?
Thank you for responding quickly. The order number is 9876543210, and the jacket is unused with all original tags still on.
We can process the return for you and initiate a full refund once we receive the jacket at our warehouse. I will email you the return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the fast service and will send the jacket back today.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited within 3–5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since there are no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for reaching out to Customer Support.
